Introduction

Noel is a South Korean male band under C-JeS Entertainment, composed of four members: Kyunsung, Sungho, Wooseung, and Sanggon. The band debuted on December 16, 2002. The group's name translates to "Sunset" in Korean. As of 2024, Noel was still active and has released several digital singles and contributed to various drama soundtracks (OSTs).
